text: 21:2 Aisaia 52:1; 61:10; Galesia 4:26; Hibru 11:10; 11:16; 12:22; Akar Mogomem 3:12; 21:10Ezɨ Nguibar God Baghavɨra Itim, a Jerusalemɨn igiam, kɨ an gari. Kɨ an garima, a Godɨn damazimɨn ikegha Godɨn Nguibam ategha izaghiri. A uabɨ akɨrigha, kurukazir bar aghuim gami, mati amizim uan pamɨn ikiasa kuruke.
